mapper.insert:
insert into teacherTitleFirstCheckInfo (checkID, teacherTitleID, checkTime, checkPerson, checkResult, checkDesc) VALUES
( #{item.checkID}, #{item.teacherTitleID}, #{item.checkTime}, #{item.checkPerson}, #{item.checkResult}, #{item.checkDesc} )

insert into teacherTitleSecondCheckInfo (checkID, teacherTitleID, checkTime, checkPerson, checkResult, checkDesc) VALUES
( #{item.checkID}, #{item.teacherTitleID}, #{item.checkTime}, #{item.checkPerson}, #{item.checkResult}, #{item.checkDesc} )
mapper.select: SELECT teacherName,positionalTitle,degree FROM t_teacher_base_info WHERE teacherNum = #{teacherNum}
mapper.update:
update teacherGreDesignTitle set
graDesignID = #{gradesignid},
titlename = #{titlename},
resultType = #{resulttype},
projectType = #{projecttype},
targetRequire = #{targetrequire},
researchContent = #{researchcontent},
titleOrigin = #{titleorigin},
titleType = #{titletype},
reqireStudentNum = #{reqirestudentnum},
checkStatus = #{checkstatus},
applyTime = #{applyTime},
gdTime = #{gdTime},
majorID = #{majorID},
isSubmit = #{isSubmit}
where teacherTitleID=#{teachertitleid}
mapper.select: SELECT graDesignID FROM gradeuateBaseInfo WHERE yearNum = #{yearNum} and semesterNum = #{semesterNum}
SELECT collegeName FROM t_college_base_info c,t_teacher_base_info t WHERE c.collegeId = t.collegeId and t.teacherNum=#{teacherNum}

select.if: SELECT teacherName,positionalTitle,degree, majorName, titlename,resulttype,projecttype,targetrequire,researchcontent,titleorigin,titletype,reqirestudentnum,checkstatus,applyTime, c1.checkResult checkFirstResult,c1.checkDesc checkFirstDesc, c2.checkResult checkSecondResult,c2.checkDesc checkSecondDesc from t_teacher_base_info t, t_major_base_info m,teacherTitleFirstCheckInfo c1,teacherTitleSecondCheckInfo c2, ( SELECT titlename,resulttype,projecttype,targetrequire,researchcontent,titleorigin,titletype,reqirestudentnum,checkstatus,teacherID,majorID,teacherTitleID FROM teacherGreDesignTitle WHERE teacherTitleID=#{teacherTitleID} ) son where t.teacherID = son.teacherID and m.majorID = son.majorID and c1.teacherTitleID=son.teacherTitleID and c2.teacherTitleID=son.teacherTitleID

mapper.select: select teacherID from t_teacher_base_info where teacherNum = #{teacherNum}
select checkStatus from teacherGreDesignTitle where teacherTitleID=#{teacherTitleID}
